testcase.name: Automation of Progress title functionality
testcase.system-out: When User enters "<username>" and "<password>"..............................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then User gets redirected to dashboard of website...........................passed And user clicks on Progress section on menu bar.............................passed Then User gets redirected to Progress section...............................passed Given User is on Progress section...........................................passed Then User should be able to see course title................................passed And user should be able to see Course, Time spent in the course, Progress, Best score in learning path, Best score not in learning path ,Latest login, Details.passed

testcase.name: Automated dropdown
testcase.system-out: When User enters "<username>" and "<password>"..............................passed And clicks on login button..................................................passed Then User gets redirected to dashboard of website...........................passed And user clicks on Progress section on menu bar.............................passed Then User gets redirected to Progress section...............................passed Given User clicks on drop-down..............................................passed When user is able to see his name and email-id..............................passed Then User clicks on his name................................................passed And gets redirected to social network page..................................passed Then user again clicks on the profile drop-down button......................passed And gets clicks on Inbox link...............................................passed When user clicks on My Certificates link....................................passed And user is redirected to certificate page..................................passed When user clicks on Logout link.............................................passed And user gets on the homepage...............................................passed
